arabic.title: Ma7adish Byenfa3 7ad | محدش بينفع حد
text: ليه بقى كله خايف من كله
مبقتش مستحمل من الجرح اللى فيا

english.title: No one cares about anyone
text: No one cares about anyone, no one fears to loose someone,
Everybody wants to take, but nobody gives to anyone.
No one thinks heartily on you, no one sympathizes with you.
And the one who stands in front of you and loves you, behind your back, he hurts you.
One after the other, we look, and the one who's not fooling anyone, is fooled.
Why is everybody still afraid of everything, and no one feels safe?
All the people are against you, and if you're standing next to someone, he will cause you pain.
And those for whom you live, and to which you're honest , he will kill you with his hand.
And those for whom you live so you can give him some things, see how he just takes and don't give.
And those you carry in your hands, see how they become monsters.
And to those you calm in your embrace, in your embrace they hurt you.
And those you trusted, they are the first people who sold you.
If you're about to take out all the pain in my heart, it would be enough for the whole universe.
And what happened to me.. there is no one in the universe which has known the same.
If someone would feel the pain of my heart, he would not handle it and stay alive.
I don't know why everyone is against me, I can no longer bear this pain inside me.
I would like to live a life, since I have never lived. During my life, I was always hurt and betrayed by humans.
Cause to all this pain, I'm just a "name", an "image", a "voice", and nothing else.
Even if I close my eyes, I constantly dream of being hurt.
When will stop these tears streaming down from my eyes?

arabic.title: أشرب شاي
text: انا أمي جت صحتني الصبح وأنا نايم على السرير
بتقولي معاد الشغل وقوم يلا وبلاش تأخير
قولتلها حاضر قايم بس مسقط أفوق ازاي؟
قالتلي تشرب ايه؟ قولتلها انا أشرب شاي
ونزلت سريع من البيت عالشغل عشان الحق أوتوبيس
وطلعت ركبته في عز الحر دماغي طلبت تهييس
دمي اتعكر من كتر الزحمة الشمس كلتلي دماغي
قومت طالع عالمكتب وبسرعة ندهت الساعي
خلصت الشغل وقلت لصاحبي نروح نقعد عالقهوة
بهدلة مرمطة فرهدة في الحر في نفوخي عملم فجوة
وقعدت أحكيله على اللي حصلي من ساعة ما صحيت
قام قالي كمان أنا زيك وياريتك ما كنت حكيت
وطلعت عند خطيبتي اللي انا معاها طافح الطين
بس خلاص هانت قربت اتجوز فاضل ست سنين
وعم الحاج أبوها جه وقالي طريقك ازاي
قولتله قبل ما اتكلم انا عايز أشرب شاي
روحت البيت عشان مش قادر ونفسي أنام
من صباحية ربنا بهدلة بجد انا تعبان
أمي جت تسألني ع اللي حصل ليه وازاي
قولتلها يا أمي قبل ما أتكلم نص كلمة أنا عايز أشرب...

english.title: I'd have a tea
text: My mom woke me up in the morning while I was in bed
Telling me it's time to get to work and not to be late
I said ok I'm up but I'm foggy, how can I soper up?
She said what would you like to drink? I said: I'd have a tea
What would you like to drink? I'd have a tea *4
Quickly I got out of the house to catch a bus to work
I got on it and it was so hot that my head went dizzy
I got nervous from the extreme crowd and the sun hit my head
So I went to my office and at once called the office boy
What would you like to drink? I'd have a tea *4
I finished my work and told my friend let's go to the cafe
The Suffering in the heat made a hole in my brain
And I kept complaining to him about what's been going on with me since this morning. He said it's been the same with me and I wish you never told me anything
What would you like to drink? I'd have a tea *4

Then I went to my fiance's house whom I've been struggling with but now we're close to getting married, only six more years to go. Her father came and said to me: what are you going to do, I said before I say anything I want to have some tea
What would you like to drink? I'd have a tea *4
Exhausted and craving sleep I went back home. Struggling since morning, I'm really tired
My mom came to ask about my day, I said mom before I say anything I want a drink
What would you like to drink? I'd have a tea *8

english.title: Ayam we Seneen
text: Days and years of your love. Forewell to it
No matter how long is the suffering, it takes its time (to cure)
Since when, I used to search for something gone
Since when, I cried for something I lost.
It was my heart’s destiny to have little happiness
I walk with you, but I went hundreds step in reverse (I know it makes no sense to me).
I was trying to heal my old wound/(love)
But you were just a small copy of that love.
Not to be by my side
And you my eye don’t shed the tears

arabic.title: بحبك اخر حاجة
text: انا لو هقول فيك كلام يطول
حبيبى دا انت عندى اغلى حاجة

english.title: I Love You to the Max
text: There is a word1 I am holding in my heart for you
My life became sweeter with you
I want to tell you my darling
And confess when I'm standing before you
You are the one my heart sensed
And the one in which I found the dream of my life
What else can I wish for darling?
I already found all my wishes in you
I love you to the max
If I try to describe you, I would go on to talk for so long
Darling, to me you are the most precious thing
My soul is in love and it's comfortable with you
And my eyes always long for you
With you I live endless dreams
And I've lived my whole life for you
It will be too little to describe you
The most beautiful thing about you
Is the smile2 in your eyes
Get closer, everything in me is calling you
Take me to a world I've never been to
Make me live a moment I've never lived
I still miss you.. When you are with me,
And I am with you every night
My darling, I can't ever forget you one day
You are on my mind on all nights
My darling, you are the most delicate angel.

english.title: I love you to the fullest
text: I have a word that I am holding in my heart, You made my life better
I wish to tell you it my love, and confess when I'm in your hands
My heart has fallen for you, and my dream of my life has been found in you,
بحبك انت آخر حاجة انا روحى ليك دايما محتاجة
انا لو هقول فيك كلام يطول حبيبى دا انت عندى اغلى حاجة
انا روحى عاشقة ومرتاحالك وعيونى دايما مشتاقالك
وياك بعيش احلام متنتهيش وحياتى ليك انا عشتهالك
انا لو هقول دا قليل عليك اجمل مافيك ضحكة عنيك يالا تعالى حبيبى قرب كل ما فيا بيناديك
ودينى دنيا مروحتهاش عيشنى لحظة معيشتهاش وانا بين ايديك بتكون واحشنى وانت معايا بشتاق اليك
(sorry that part doesn't make sense in Arabic or English)
I am with you every night, my love I can't forget you, in my mind every night y love your the kindest angel

arabic.title: بخاف
text: كل لما شوف عمري يجري بيا
حتى في كلامي حتى في غنايا
لا الضحكة الحلوة تبقى جناين أحزان طرحة
لا تضيع أحلامي اللي شايفها عروسة فطرحة
حتى في عذابي حتى في لهيبي
يبقى يجرح قلبي بعد ما أحب بكل ضميري
لانهاية حبي تتطرح شوق وعذاب قدامي
حتى اللي ليا حتى اللي مني
لو حسوا بيا لو حسوا فني
علـى كـل حبايبي أكتر من خوفي عليـا
والخوف بقى دنيا بني آدميين عيشين حواليا
قربت أشك في إحساسي وصحابي وأحبابي وناسي
حتى في كلامي حتى في غنايا

english.title: I Am Afraid
text: Whenever I see my life running away with me,
Even in my words, even in my singing,
My pain shows up, my tears show up.
That the sweet smile turns into a garden of sadness.
From the loss of my time.
That my dreams might be lost which I see as a beautiful bride.
A ship that never lands in any anchorage.
A sailor who searches for land.
I laugh but between me and my self,
All of the world's sorrow is in me.
A beautiful song that bleeds with bitterness.
Even in my agony and my burning.
I hide myself from my best friend.
That she might sell me for another person.
The she might hurt my heart even after loving her with all of my heart.
That she might betray my hopes.
That my love turns to misery in front of me.
Whenever I count the hours of my joy,
I turn out to be losing.
Whenever I miss people that I loved,
My heart feels nostalgic about them,
Then it starts crying teardrops of sorrow.
Even the ones who are there for me, the ones I belong to,
If they ever felt the suffering in my voice,
About my loved ones more than I am about myself.
And fear became like people who live around me.
Whenever two lovers make a promise,
One of them must break their promise.
And from the horrors I see,
I became afraid of my feelings, friends, lovers and my folk.
Even in my words, even in my singing,
My pain shows up, my tears show up.

text: everytime i see my life is running infront of me ( i scare )
when my flower melt inside of me ( i scare )
even in my words even in my songs my bain shows my tears shows

arabic.title: تصور
text: دا انا من يوم ماشوفت عنيك

english.title: Picture It/Imagine
text: Baby I'm right behind you, I'm coming for you, my heart admires you and I dream of you many times, you've been unreachable for years
This is life, but now I know its path, I will not stray from her after I have found her, that's the truth and tomorrow I will show you how even stone can turn soft
Picture it.. Baby I'm willingly okay with being taken in circles and throwing my soul into a fire, all for the one who made this life glow in the blink of an eye
Imagine it.. I came and went yet have not found anyone prettier, there is something missing in me, but with you I will be complete, and those who are patient will reach their goals
If you so much as said "how are you?" I will melt in front of an angel like you, from the moment I saw your eyes and (my heart) was stolen
Your distance is deadly, and I swear I am desperately waiting for your return and if karma should happen tomorrow you will see

english.title: My Darling
text: to say I will forget you
Darling, I went away from you
even when I was with you
I was able to say to you
that I will go away from you
Even though my soul goes to you
And I forgot, but my heart was with you
I acted as though I was challenging you
For the sake of the love of my soul
My darling, no matter how many years
I still love you to death
I never forgot even one second
that passed in the blink of an eye
And separation was stronger than us
and our separation is the end
My love for you will remain
And till the last day of my life
My darling, I will keep on
loving you, oh.. I love you

arabic.title: خدنى ليك
text: عيد :عارفة كان نفسى تبقى سامعه الى جوايه دلوقتى]
نهى :ايوة سمعاك وحاسة بيك وبالى عاوز تقوله ياعيد
عيد :انا مش مصدق ان حلمى اتحقق وانت معايا دلوقتى أنا
عيد :أنا أنا بحبك بحبك من قبل ما اشوفك
نهى : اة لو تعرف انى كنت السبب فى الى انت كنت فيه بس انت خفيت دلوقتى
عيد: قليلى انك سمعانى قوليلى يانهى
[نهى :انت طلعتلى منين ياعيد ايوة سمعاك وح اقولك على كل حاجة

english.title: TAKE ME TO YOU
text: take me to you come closer to me
let your hands hug my hands
hug me let me belive that your infront of me
i was dearming of you in my days
a dream that change the color of my life
i wish to live beside you my life
come on take me to onther world
a world that different from this world
a haven way over than imagntion
if your hand touch my hand
if your eyes come to my eyes
ahaa you will know what's in me

arabic.title: خلقتني
text: خلقتنى انسان ضعيف والحياه كانت اقوى منى
تهت فيها سنين طويلة مش بايدى غصب عنى
لو كنت انت بعيد عن ربك
شوف كام غلطة كانت فى حياتك
يااااااااه يا الله يا الله يا الله
ياااااااه يا الله يا الله يا الله
تهنا فيها عن حقوق كانت علينا
وملحياه راح ناخد ايه غير ايمان وصلاة نبينا
الشيطان لما لقانى انسان ضعيف خدنى وغوانى
لو كنت انت بعيد عن ربك
شوف كام غلطة كانت فى حياتك
ياااااااااه يا الله يا الله يا الله

english.title: Allah please forgive me
text: it was out of my hands..(not under my control)
he forgat the weak and took me with him
and I returned to you my god
and if u are not close to god
get closer and pray.. trust ur heart
pray ang show god ur love
think again and count to ten
look how many miskates u did
forgive ur self about everything had passed
so ur mistakes will be ur goodness
rights that we were suposed to take
but from this life what will we take ?
beside to beleive and prays to our self

arabic.title: دايما دموع
text: دايما الم دايما عذاب دايما جراح

english.title: Always/Usually Tears
text: Always pain always torture always wounded
But the happiness is forbidden forbidden forbidden
We wait patiently as our souls do
Our wounds are usually screaming inside of us more when we're sad than when we're happy
We're walking down our path, our way
We're content with what we're given
We try to laugh and let things pass
We're patient with our quarrels and tears
And our poor hearts are confused
W meet people and they take our lives
And we're left empty-handed in the end
We regret everything that has passed
And we start again from fresh
We leave the people who have scarred us and fall in love for those who will kill us
A lover won't complete you nor will a friend
No one but the pain is your friend
People's feelings don't show the sweet ones have turned into the backstabbers
And whatever is written for you will happen
No one feels the pain you feel they've all agreed to trick you
That's it everyone has made you cheap and who will you run to other than your past
Because those of your past have sold you as the ones in your present
Everytime we get away from this world it comes back to hurt us
Looks like we will have to live in this world that doesn't understand us nor do we understand it
We're content with it's torture and the importance, how can we blame her when we know this is a strange world we're in
My sadness is that we're quiet and we give in
If we're hurt we will cry and feel the pain
If it's a tear I will wipe it with my hand
Yes it's always tears tears tears

english.title: The Tear in her Eyes
text: I felt pity for the tear in her eyes
I felt for her, and she sold me out
And all this happened because I am kind
In the end, she wounded me, she became harsh
ِAnd once she had power, she used it against me
I loved for years and years
I healed her wounds with my kindness
She sold me out in the blink of an eye
I sacrificed a lot for her
I wished to reassure her heart
She wounded me a great wound
I wish I'd never known her

english.title: Like You, Like Them
text: Don't tell me you're by my side and ready to sacrifice.. You said you were close to my heart, I swear I was so full of you
You turned out to be just like you, just like them, no, you're worse.. if you have loved ones then love them, but do it far away from me
Because I don't have anything left in this love, it's over when it started, and I hope you're happy, are you happy now?
Everyone who had seen you from the start assumed you were such a sweetheart, but the one who gets close to you and moves forward can feel the pain at it's worse
You turned out to be just like you, just like them, no, you're worse.. if you have loved ones then love them, but do it far away from me
Because I don't have anything left in this love, it's over when it started, and I hope you're happy, are you happy now?

english.title: Sometimes
text: Sometimes the wounds can comfort and sometimes tears can calm us down.. And for what reasons should we ache, eventually it all goes and passes
The world doesn't stop and people come and go.. So a wound for a wound is normal, who on Earth is not hurt?
Many people were in my life and today what's left of them.. Separation has become normal and my heart is used to it
Half my life had passed and don't think I was happy about it.. I wish I knew why the world was against.
In this life as long as I am alive, even without silk.. I will not die as long as I'm alive and separation is fate
What else will I lose in my life and what else will I regret, many like me and a thousand more than me are living among strangers

arabic.title: شايفك مصدق نفسك
text: على كل حال انت اللى بديت

english.title: I See You Believe
text: I see you believe yourself and you disagree with me, and you count my mistakes, and you play the part of the upset one
And you also have the audacity to cry and complain to the people, I've had enough of that, you were the one who was wrong

If you've forgotten come back and I will remind you of my pain.. And how I had lived with you and put up with and sacrificed so much.. I would go on like nothing happened and you would get crazy with me
You are a mistake my heart had made and now it pays the price.. I won't repeat it and make things worse, that's it, it's over and a closed case.. You act as if you had bought me, but you betrayed me
Forget about what's on your mind and go your own way.. mind your own business and I will mind my own
Give me a break, I couldn't wait until I finally forgot, and there's nothing left that you can take from me, regardless you were the one who started it

english.title: Do you know
text: when u r not with me.. nothing left to make me happy
nothing left to make me rest...
and the memories still hunting me...
get back to me and let me heal...
and you'r still not with me..
and my eyes falled in love with my tear...
you are my life and my world...
life isnt like it was before..
and the pain is destroing me..
my love.. if u could only feel what im going through..if u could hear my cry..
from the day you heart left me...
have mercy on my tears and get back to me
the heartbeats you entered.. need you with them !
its impossible for you to get me away from my love..
my soul sweared never to leave me..
and u'r swetnees is killing me
if u'r really sad because of something I did.. tell me.. before the end
you'r distance is too painfull for me
and you from you'r heartbeats had confiscate me..
its impossible for you to still treat me this way..
I drew all of my dreams with you
all the happiness I had only with you..
even if you'll ask ur heart..
it will tell you that its enough..

english.title: Be Classless
text: I will not talk to you
nor will I talk about you1
Maybe you can satisfy your arrogance through me
how you can kill my heart
I want you to sell2 me every minute
Pretend to be innocent and deceive me
I want to know how could you manage
To sleep at night after all this
No matter how high you ascend you will come back down
He who breaks the heart of another,
he who is unjust to an innocent,
he who manages to be selfish
must be humiliated by the entire world
and the whole world steps on him
And what he did to all the people [he hurt]
must one day happen to him
You have become so grand in my eyes3
But what you did to me

arabic.title: كان بينا حب
text: كان فيه مشاعر اكبر من احساس بقلب
كان فيه صراحة بجد وعمره ما كان فيه كدب
كان حب بس ما فيش خداع
ليه كل حاجة حلوة عمرها قصير
دا انا من غيرك يا عمري
ليه كل حاجة حلوة عمرها قصير
ليه كل حاجة حلوة عمرها قصير

english.title: ove used to live between us.
text: loved used to live between us..deep emotions and feelings used to live in this heart.
honesty used to live here..no place for lies
love used to live here without cheating.. only love
why all the beautifull things in this world have a short life term? /or/ beautiful things couldnt live long
why is everything changing in our eyes?
I gave you my life.. I sacrificed my years
(without you my life I dont know how to live life)

arabic.title: كل اما افكر فيك
text: رغم ان احنا بعيد عن بعض
كل ما صورتك تيجي في ايدي
كل لما اقول علي قلبك غادر
كل ما اقول انساك مش قادر

english.title: Everytime I think of you
text: Everytime I think of you, everytime I miss you
Everytime I cry for you, my heart tells me: forget her, there is no space for you in her heart
Don't miss her, don't go back to her, don't need her..don't..don't..don't
So, I go far away, fold(hide) the nostalgia by my own hands, but my increased nostalgia for you and my love is raised against my will
i can't stop my heart from missing her, needing her, crying for her
what can I do?It is something against my will
Although we are far from eachother, although we are who choosed to apart from eachother
Everytime I get your picture in my hands, my eye tears
what can I do?It is something against my will
Everytime I say that your heart had left me, everytime I say I will forget you, I can't
Your love is still (living) in my soul, your love is still having me, captivating me
what can I do?It is something against my will
I am always thinking of you, I am always missing you
I am always crying for you,  my heart tells me: forget her, there is no space for you in her heart
Don't miss her, don't go back to her, don't need her..don't..don't..don't
So, I go far away, fold(hide) the nostalgia by my own hands, but my increased nostalgia for you and my love is raised against my will
i can't stop my heart from missing her, needing her, crying for her
Everywhere reminds me of the whispering of our eyes, the touch of our hands
our dreams, all of our oaths
Everytime I teach my eyes to become ruthless(towards these places)
My heart says: I miss him, forgive me
Everywhere reminds me of what I have planned with you
Do you remember our last day, when I farewelled you, do you remember when your heart smashed mine into pieces
I am always thinking of you, I am always missing you
I am always crying for you,  my heart tells me: forget her, there is no space for you in her heart
Don't miss her, don't go back to her, don't need her..don't..don't..don't
So, I go far away, fold(hide) the nostalgia by my own hands, but my increased nostalgia for you and my love is raised against my will
i can't stop my heart from missing her, needing her, crying for her

english.title: Kolle mafakkar fik
text: kolle mafakkar fik kolle ma aheni elik kolle ma abki alik
قلبى يقولى انساه ملناش مكان جواه
my heart says:forget him we don't have a place inside him
web3ed ba3eed we ba3eed wetwi el hanin bel id
وغصب عنى تقيد نارى ونار حبى
i have nothing to do about it,my fire is on and so is my love's fire
ma2darsh ahoosh albi yeshta9 elik yhen elik we yebki alik
آه آه آه آه يا حبيبى
رغم ان احنا بعيد عن بعض رغم ان احنا اختارنا البعد
despite we're away from each other ,despite we chose this distance(to be away)
kolle ma soortak tigi fi idi dam3et 3ini betinzel meni
كل ما اقول على قلبك غادر كل ما اقول انساك مش قادر
everytime i say that your love is a betrayl,everytime i say that i'll forget you but i can't
lessa gharamak saken roohi lessa el hob malekni aserni
كل ما افكر فيك كل ما احن اليك كل ما ببكى عليك
everytime i think about you ,everytime i tend to you,everyyime i cry for you
albi ye2ool ensah malnash makan guwwah
don't tend to him,don't go back to him don't miss him
وابعد بعيد وبعيد واطوى الحنين بالايد
and go away and away and supreme the passion by hand
we ghasba anni anni te2eed nari we nar hobbi
مقدرش احوش قلبى يشتاق اليك يحن ليك ويبكى عليك
i can't stop my heart from missing you and tending to you and crying for you
ah ah ah ah ya habibi
be hams 3nina we lamset idina we bi ahlamna we kolle we3oodna
كل ما اعلم عينى القسوة قلبى يقول مشتاق اعذرنى
everytime i teach my heart the cruality he says:" exuse me i miss him"
belli rasamtu ma3ak we banitu welli zaman bi idik haditi
فاكر اخر يوم ودعتك فاكر قلبك لما كسرنى
do you remember the last day i said goodbey when it broke me
kolle mafakkar fik kolle ma aheni elik kolle ma abki alik
قلبى يقولى انساه ملناش مكان جواه
my heart says:forget him we don't have a place inside him
web3ed ba3eed we ba3eed wetwi el hanin bel id
وغصب عنى تقيد نارى ونار حبى
i have nothing to do about it,my fire is on and so is my love's fire
ma2darsh ahoosh albi yeshta9 elik yhen elik we yebki alik
آه آه آه آه يا حبيبى

english.title: And with you I Feel
text: - When you touch me, I feel like I have the world and everything I've been missing in my hands.
- And when you speak... I learn to love people and I feel safe as long as you feel my love.
- And with you I feel, like I'm in the sky, not on earth...
- ...And that you are an angel and that a year with you passes by like a second.
- let me live in your love... I have to live with you... I want you to come close to me and look me in the eyes.
- you made me forget the past... With you, I was able to see and experience things, I've never seen or done before.
- And with you I feel, like I'm in the sky, not on earth...
- ...And that you are an angel and that a year with you passes by like a second.
- No matter how much I dream of you or imagine you... all this love I have for you will not be enough.
- I wish to be happy with you and enjoy your love (forever).
- Please take me in your arms (hug) and hold me close to you.
-  And with you I feel, like I'm in the sky, not on earth...
- ...And that you are an angel and that a year with you passes by like a second.

english.title: When You Touch Me
text: When you touch me you make me feel that I missed out on so much.. and when you speak I learn to love others around me and I am at ease as long as you feel for me
With you I feel that I am in the sky and not on Earth.. And that you are an angel and a year passes with you as if it were a second
Let me live in your live, I must live with you, I want you to come closer to me and gaze into my eyes
You made me forget the past, with you, I saw things I had not seen until you were standing in my arms
Regardless of how much I dream of you or how much I imagined you, all my love will still not sum up to (how amazing) you (are)
I hope to be happy with you and in your love, I beg you, take me in your arms and bring me closer to you

english.title: Lama Btelmasni
text: When you touch me you make me feel
That I am on top of the world.. all that's missing in me
And when you talk I learn to love others and am ok as long as you feel me
That I am in the sky
And that you are an angel
And with you a year passes by in one second
Let me live in your love
I have to live with you
I want you to be close to me
That I have not seen until you were standing between my arms
No matter how much I've dreamt of you
All this love for you is still not enough
I wish to be happy with you
Promise me to take me in your arms
And to bring me closer to you

arabic.title: متغيرة
text: وانا قال بقول ,هو انتي ليه متغيرة
كل ده علشان لقيتي في جيبي صورة
دي صورة أمي وهيا لسه صغيرة!

english.title: Different
text: And here I was saying: Why are you acting different?
Now everything, yes everything is clear
All this because you found a photo in my pocket?
It's the photo of my mother when she was still young!
Enough jealousy and doubts in me
and why are your eyes always on me?
You are always jealous of tall girls
even if your height was 2 handspans1, I like you
Your height or breadth doesn't matter
My heart is in the place of my eyes
Enough jealousy and doubts in me
and why are your eyes always on me?
You are always jealous of tall girls

arabic.title: محمد نبينا
text: اللهم صلى وسلم و بارك عليه

english.title: Muhammad Our Prophet
text: Muhammad Our Prophet Guides Us With His Light
From Makkah, O Beloved His Light Was Glowing Over Madinah
He Who Prays His Prayers And Tries To Imitate His Attitudes
Oh How Lucky He Is Who Walks In His Presence
And Gains His Intercession After Death
Oh Our Imam, The Trustworthy One
Oh Guardian & Support To All Muslims
Oh My Beloved Muhammad (S.a.w), The Son Of Abdullah
And The Beloved One Is The Sweetest Seal (Of The Prophets)
Throughout All My Life And In My Prayers, I Make A Supplication To Pray Behind Him [In The Next Life]
From The First Day In My Life That I Heard My Mother And Father Praying Upon Him
He Endeared Faith To Me, Granted Peace To Me & Made Me Love Him
Oh Allah Send Blessings & Peace Upon Him
Oh Allah Send Blessings & Peace Upon Him
I Wish To See You In My Dreams, O Messenger Of God
And I Cry On Your Shoulder & Sleep There, O Beloved Of God
And I Attain Honor With Your Accompaniment
And I Walk Among The Ranks Of Your Ummah
And I Am Protected By You
Oh Beloved, O Pure One, You Who Had Survived The Maze
You Changed The World In Our Eyes Between A Night And Its Morning [Referring To The Night Journey]
He Who Prays His Prayers And Tries To Improve His Attributes
How Lucky Is He Who Walks In His Shadow
And Adds To Him With His Death

english.title: Mohammed Our Prophet
text: Mohammed our prophet gave us his light
From Mecca his light was glaring on Medina
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death
Oh our Imam, the secure one, the support prop for Muslims
And you hold the seal (of the prophets)
Throughout my life and in my prayers I call praying to him
Mohammed our prophet gave us his light
From Mecca his light was glaring on Medina
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death
From the first day in my life that I heart my mother and father praying to him
It made me love faith and feel secure and I was indelibly attached to it
God pray, protect and bless him
God pray, protect and bless him
I see you myself in my sleep, oh messenger of God
And I cry on your should and sleep there, oh beloved of God
And I attain honor with your accompaniment
And I walk among the ranks of your Umma
And I am protected by you
Mohammed our prophet gave us his light
From Mecca his light was glaring on Medina
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death
Oh beloved oh pure one oh deliverance from the maze
You changed the world in our eyes between a night and its morning (referring to the night journey)
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death

english.title: Mohammed Our Prophet
text: Mohammed our prophet gave us his light
From Mecca his light was glaring on Medina
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death
Oh our Imam, the secure one, the support prop for Muslims
And you hold the seal (of the prophets)
Throughout my life and in my prayers I call praying to him
Mohammed our prophet gave us his light
From Mecca his light was glaring on Medina
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death
From the first day in my life that I heart my mother and father praying to him
It made me love faith and feel secure and I was indelibly attached to it
God pray, protect and bless him
God pray, protect and bless him
I see you myself in my sleep, oh messenger of God
And I cry on your should and sleep there, oh beloved of God
And I attain honor with your accompaniment
And I walk among the ranks of your Umma
And I am protected by you
Mohammed our prophet gave us his light
From Mecca his light was glaring on Medina
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death
Oh beloved oh pure one oh deliverance from the maze
You changed the world in our eyes between a night and its morning (referring to the night journey)
He who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
How lucky is he who walks in his shadow
And adds to him with his death

arabic.title: مستني إيه
text: ولا انت لازم تبكى قدامك عنيا؟

english.title: What Are You Waiting For
text: What are you waiting for can't you see or am I invisible? What are you waiting for, do I have to cry in front of you to get some attention?
Hug me more than that, tell me why and how long you've been absent, when I needed you
Make up to me all that had gone, I had seen so much in your absence, there were only hours left 'til I'd die from my worries for you.
From so long I'd say the worst is over, tomorrow she'll return to me.. Day after day I am in your absence and I hoped for this moment to come

english.title: What Are You Waiting For
text: What are you waiting for can't you see or am I invisible? What are you waiting for, do I have to cry in front of you to get some attention?
Hug me more than that, tell me why and how long you've been absent, when I needed you
Make up to me all that had gone, I had seen so much in your absence, there were only hours left 'til I'd die from my worries for you.
From so long I'd say the worst is over, tomorrow she'll return to me.. Day after day I am in your absence and I hoped for this moment to come.

arabic.title: مسطول
text: يا ليلي يا ليل يا ليل يا عين
كان ليا في يوم حبيب يا خسارة باعني
وانا لا ندمان عليه ولا هبكي فيوم عليه
انا جاي أجامل, انا انا انا انا
*المرا تصرخ: يا بابااا, اههه, اههههه, اههه*

english.title: Intoxicated
text: Oh night oh eye oh night oh night oh eye
I once had a darling unfortunately she sold me out
I bought her for a lot and she sold me for cheap
I don't regret her nor will I ever cry over her
I'm coming to behave with courtesy and go home
And see the one who sold me and left me and betrayed me
This family is ill-mannered and swindling
And tonight we came to celebrate you
The fiance of my fiance is a happless boy
He got engaged to her when she had money
This poor guy will be a poor guy even if you stuck a lantern (fanoos: type of decorative lantern used in Egypt especially at Ramadan and special occassions) on top of his head
I'm coming to behave with courtesy and go home
And see the one who sold me and left me and betrayed me
And these people have no honor
With my money they made a wedding
I'm coming to behave with courtesy and go home
And see the one who sold me and left me and betrayed me

arabic.title: مش هقول
text: مش حاقول عا اللي حصل بيني و بينه
لما قابلني و جات عيني في عينه
حبيت و اللي انكتب على الجبين
و افضل على ناري و تعذيبي
و عا الحال دة يا غالي بقالي زمان
أنا ما اقدرش و ما اتحملشي
تبعد عن قلبي كمان و كمان

english.title: I Won't Say
text: I won't say what happened between me and her
When she met me and her eyes gazed into mine
This is the one I love
Oh my eyes oh my eyes
And the two flowers on each pretty cheek
The one who's kept me sprung from years
I loved and I was destined for her, the eyes can see
No one compares to her beauty
No one has seduction like hers
My heart has gone to you
My heart melts and got burned
Burned by the fire of love
Is this a way to react
And stay burning with desire and the situation is precious from long ago
I can't handle you going away time after time

arabic.title: ناس عيشتها ارتاحت
text: يا ليل يا عينى يا ليلى
انا لا عايز  قصر ولا براح
انا عايز اقف فى طابور مرتاح

english.title: people who lived comfortably
text: and others got lost in the crowd
some people stay up at night everyday
some people are getting richer and richer
others getting  out of their clothes
some people are flying over the mat
some people are wearing silk clothes
and others are sleeping on the floor
I don't want to live in a castle or a wide place
I want to stand in line comfortably
and get some bread and go home
I don't want to drink packed water
water from the tap would be fine
my fear is that it wouldn't exist anymore
and i keep shouting oh water !

english.title: Some live happily
text: But others reek of bad smell
Some have accomplished and got high-up in the society
But others got lost in the crowd
Some stay up late at night,
But others sleep instead of having dinner
Some become more richer and richer,
But others ran out of clothes
Some ride on a flying carpet,
And others lived their lives on installments
Some are dressed in silk from head to toe,
But others sleep on the floor
I need not a palace nor a big land,
I want to stand up in the line, feeling good about myself
And I take my bread and go to my house
And I sleep with my conscience being pleased
I don't want to drink mineral water,
I'm fine with the tap water,
I hope they won't cut it on me,
And I keep calling, water, where are you?

arabic.title: واقع فى شبكتك
text: دا انا قلبى اتكسر واتبعتر واتفكك
دا انا راضى بالمر بس الاقينى ملكتك
خدى بالك لاء دا انا ممكن اتنك
بعدها مش هخلص من وشك ولا زنك
وهتعملى ايه فى واحد قلبه مهنج
وكانه متبنج غير كدا يا هطق
انا شاب رجولة واقف سبع فى ضهرك
راضى اموت بسهولة بس احوش مهرك
دا انا اهد الدنيا اصلى جرئ من يومى
وعشانك اضيع وابيع ان شاء الله هدومى
ليقولوا كان شاب وبسببك راح فيها
الافترا مش حلو اتكسفى على نفسك
ليه كدا معرفش مقلوب حتة قلبة
والليلة مش قفش وبجد مش طالبة
لو مين قدامى قلبىك عمرى ما ابيعه

english.title: Fallen in your Net
text: [I have] fallen in your net and I am planning and making tactics
Waiting for the moment to be engaged to1 you
My heart has been broken, scattered and pulled apart
And I see that you are coming so I indulge myself and make [nonsensical] excuses
And in the peak of heat
I am so cold and freezing
I am content with the suffering if it means I'll have you
Take care, I can be haughty2
And then I would have enough of your buzzing and bugging of me
What would you do with a guy with a heart that is not responding?
As if he is drugged3, Otherwise I'll blow up
or get driven to madness because of you
I am in the midst of a hardship
It seems that you are playing me
I am a manly5 guy, a lion who has your back
I am content of dying easily but just let me save for your dowry6
I would make the world crumble, I have been bold since the day I was born
For you, I would be lost and even sell my clothes
What do you mean then? Come on let's get along
otherwise they'll say he was a young guy who died because of you
Try for once to say what you want
Being unfair is not nice, be embarrassed of your actions
Why I am being ignored like this, I don't know
Tonight it is not a fight7 and seriously this is not the time for this
No matter who stands before8 me, I would never sell your heart
And in all seriousness, I am ready in every way possible

arabic.title: يا رب نفضل كده مع بعض

english.title: We Stay Together Forever
text: I won't keep away from your eyes
Can I live without your eyes ?
God , You and me not leaving each other
God , I want to stay with you forever
God, Let's stay with you till the end
And our love has no end
And don't stop loving each other
And we continue until the end
From the first time we met
And It is also too much
God , You and me not leaving each other
God , I want to stay with you forever
God, Let's stay with you till the end
And our love has no end
And don't stop loving each other
And we continue until the end

arabic.title: صلوات النبي Salawat un Nabi Medley
text: مولاى صلّ و سلم دائما أبدا
يا ربي بجاه النبي أزح الغمة
يا ربي بجاه النبي أزح الغمة

english.title: Salawat un Nabi Medley
text: O my Master, send your salutations and blessings forever
Upon Your Beloved, the best of the whole of creation)
Oh Prophet, peace be upon you
Send blessings upon the Prophet and smile!
For the Prophet smiled and smiled
O Allah, send Your blessings upon him
It tastes happiness while lost in love
Send salutations upon him, the intercessor of the Muslim nation
By mentioning the messenger we sharpen our zeal
O God, for the sake of the prophet, clear the adversity
like a moon like a moon the radiance of prophet is just like the moon
and how beautiful how beautiful how beautiful is our prophet
Our beloved prophet MUHAMMAD gave us his light as a gift
from mecca his bright light glowing to medinah
he who prays his prayers and tries to improve his attributes
how lucky is he who walks in his shadow
May salutations be sent upon you
May salutations be sent upon you O my Beloved
May salutations be sent upon you
May salutations be sent upon you O my Beloved
O Prophet of Allah, O Messenger of Allah.
